Package net.greg.examples.salient

Class Watch

java.lang.Object
net.greg.examples.salient.Watch
public final class Watch
extends java.lang.Object

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Watch.BarrierLauncher
    A default action can be performed when all threads have arrived at the barrier
    static class  Watch.ChimeAssailant
    Threads that await the barrier becoming filled to number of companion threads have reached the barrier - as stipulated by the parallelism factor.

  • Field Details

    • PARALLELISM_FACTOR

      private static final int PARALLELISM_FACTOR
      A GATE/CAPACITY value that is used for both the CyclicBarrier, and for sizing the Executor which populates that CyclicBarrier
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • BARRIER

      private static final java.util.concurrent.CyclicBarrier BARRIER

    • POOL

      private static final java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService POOL
      Maintain enough threads to support the given parallelism level - use multiple queues to reduce contention. The parallelism factor is the maximum number of threads available-for/actively engaged-in task processing. The thread-count is dynamic, nor is there any guarantee of execution ordinality of submitted tasks. NB pool members s.b. of type: ChimeAssailant (named: Chime rihgt now)
